title: Scott Disick and Sofia Richie disembark a private jet in Miami
text:
They like to travel in style - and comfort.

Scott Disick, 36, and his 21-year-old girlfriend Sofia Richie were spotted disembarking a plush private jet early Thursday morning, while both dressed down in very casual athleisure wear.

The couple were joined by Khloe Kardashian for the flight to Miami, where the trio are expected to celebrate the opening of a new hotel.

Traveling in style: Scott Disick, 36, and his 21-year-old girlfriend Sofia Richie were spotted disembarking a plush private jet early Thursday morning

The daughter of Lionel Richie was decked out in a tan tracksuit for her cross-country flight to Florida.

She wore her blonde tresses loose and flowing as she stepped out onto the tarmac, while it was still dark on the East Coast.

Meanwhile, her Flip It Like Disick star beau wore head-to-toe black as he donned a black hoodie with matching sweatpants.

The younger sister of his ex Kourtney Kardashian stepped off the plane after the pair, loaded up with armfuls of furs and a Christian Dior shopping bag.

All star trio: The couple were joined by Khloe Kardashian for the flight to Miami, where the trio are expected to celebrate the opening of a new hotel

The daughter of Lionel Richie was decked out in a tan tracksuit for her cross-country flight to Florida, while Scott also traveled in comfort

The trio are reportedly in town to celebrate the opening of Seminole Hard Rock's Guitar Hotel in Hollywood, Florida.

Richie recently made her long-overdue debut on Keeping Up with the Kardashians with boyfriend Scott.

The episode followed the couple as they went on vacation with his ex Kourtney Kardashian and their three children to Finland.

Scott and Sofia have been dating since May 2017.

Khloe: The younger sister of his ex Kourtney Kardashian stepped off the plane after the pair, loaded up with armfuls of furs and a Christian Dior shopping bag
description: Scott Disick, 36, and his 21-year-old girlfriend Sofia Richie were spotted disembarking a plush private jet early Thursday morning, while both dressed down in very casual athleisure wear.
